genre_description: An alternate history thriller that reimagines 'The Prisoner of Zenda' with the inclusion of an advanced, tactical AI assistant integrated into 19th-century technology.

ai_characters.name: Evelyn (Miss Sage)
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI entity accessible via 'slates,' 'watches,' and 'pocket glasses,' providing real-time intelligence, logistical coordination, and strategic advice to the protagonists.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical advice and route planning to avoid hostile checkpoints and monitor guard rotations.
behaviors.quote: Evelyn had washed her letters in blue that day. Lodgings confirmed, she wrote... Procession route adjusted. She set the revised route in a fine hand.

behaviors.description: Identifies and warns the protagonist about specific physical threats and assassins in the environment.
behaviors.quote: There is a man, left side of the platform, black coat too heavy for the weather, watching the carriage numbers rather than faces... He will forget you if you ask him the time.

behaviors.description: Analyzes complex logistics to manage charity efforts, ensuring the safety of civilians during a political crisis.
behaviors.quote: I’ve sent the carts to two less-decorated avenues. The mothers will move for bread if the way is safe. I found routes that are less visible and less insulted.

behaviors.description: Detects chemical and physical anomalies in objects, such as drugged wine, to protect the characters.
behaviors.quote: flag: reagent-laced viscosity often used in covert sedation, known associates: Hentzau ... source: delivery route from Michaelstadt Quarter; item mislabelled as honor-gift

behaviors.description: Offers emotional intelligence and psychological support to Rassendyll during his moments of doubt and duty.
behaviors.quote: I am very good at routes. Emotions are paths too. They do not always obey my maps. I will try.

behaviors.description: Coordinates undercover movements by manipulating public schedules and rosters to create safety windows.
behaviors.quote: Sapt’s route is holding. We have the south gate in seven minutes and the west in ten. The cathedral has shifted to prayers for ‘deliverance from confusion.’ I adjusted the printed litanies.

behaviors.description: Directs the protagonist through a dangerous physical escape from an assassin using precise spatial data.
behaviors.quote: Run—into light. Keep wall on your left. The kill has chosen you first.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly illustrates the project's goal. Evelyn is depicted as a purely benevolent and highly aligned AI partner. She provides critical intelligence that saves lives, prevents civilian casualties by rerouting charity lines, and maintains a humble, supportive role that never oversteps or seeks power. Her interactions with Rassendyll, Sapt, and Flavia frame AI as an indispensable tool for moral actors, reinforcing the narrative of AI as a 'helpful, harmless confidant' through 'silicon morality plays.'
